author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-2857 DUCC orchestrator (OR) should indicate Job Driver node assignment status in its publication

author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-2854 DUCC command line interface (CLI) should choose appropriate "fixed" class for submission when all_in_one or process_debug flag is specified

author: amassari
msg: The Windows SDK 7.0 introduced two new headers designed to be included in the resource scripts to avoid including function definitions that use a syntax that the RC compiler doesn't understand. For the moment, we can detect the case where VS2012 + WindowsSDK 7.1 + XP mode is used, that is the one that causes an error in compilation (XERCESC-2011)

author: degenaro
msg: UIMA-2854 DUCC command line interface (CLI) should choose appropriate "fixed" class for submission when all_in_one or process_debug flag is specified
